articles.description: Where can the Seahawks get better on defense after a rough loss to the Rams? Former NFL LB Dave Wyman breaks it down in Football 101.
articles.content:
Another week, another rough outing for the Seahawks defensively.
Against the Los Angeles Rams in Week 5 on Thursday Night Football, Seattle’s NFC West rival put up 26 points and over 450 yards on of… [+1958 chars]
